thread.section_title: Novotel Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday weekend
thread.title_full: Birthday weekend - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bridget B
title: Birthday weekend
text:
We arrived fairly early at about 12.30 in the afternoon but it was no trouble . Our room was upgraded to a superior river view which was a lovely surprise . When we got to our room on the twelfth floor we had the loveliest surprise , our view of Paris was amazing .Everything was laid out before us , fantastic views of the tower , sacre Coeur and the arc de triomphe . We ate in the cafe on the first night and the food was good if a little expensive , but we were in Paris . The bar had a good selection of drinks that were not too expensive . When we come back to Paris we would stay here again . To sum up it was clean , quiet and only steps away from the metro station .
Room Tip: Twelfth floor had great views See more room tips Green Features: Towels were reused , which so often doesn't happen .
